title: Restaurant Settings
subtitle: Manage your operation preferences and alerts.

waitingAlert.label: Alert for Waiting Customer (minutes)
waitingAlert.help: Defines after how long waiting the customer will be marked with a visual alert.

calledAlert.label: Alert for Called Customer (minutes)
calledAlert.help: Defines after how long being called (without seating) the customer will be marked with alert.

window.label: Calculation window (minutes)
window.help: Consider only customers who entered the queue in the last X minutes to calculate average time.

fallback.label: Average time fallback (minutes)
fallback.help: Value displayed when there is not enough data in the configured window.
